content: As an artificial intelligence language model, I do not have personal experiences or preferences. However, Rishikesh is a popular destination for yoga and meditation retreats, and many people visit there to immerse themselves in spiritual practices, learn about different forms of yoga and meditation, and participate in workshops and other activities. The town is situated on the banks of the river Ganges, surrounded by scenic mountains and natural beauty, making it an ideal location for those seeking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life. Depending on your interests, you can explore different yoga and meditation ashrams, take part in various classes and workshops, or simply relax and rejuvenate amidst the serene surroundings.
